QuestData.Title: The Lord's Behest
QuestData.Description: Lord Norwington will want to thank you for saving his son himself. Why don't you come to the estate? We're preparing for a festival, and everybody's welcome.$b$bWe'll go ahead and tell him of all that has happened. See you there!
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Lord Aldrius Norwington at the Norwington Estate.
QuestData.RewardText: You're $n? The hero that saved my son from the troggs?$b$bHohoho! You are very welcome at my estate! You must regale me with your tales of your gallant rescue!
